title: The Complete Photography Book - Third Revised Edition 2014
description:
The Complete Photography Book is the ultimate guide to getting the most out of your photography. Follow our essential techniques so that you can master the basics and get to grips with a range of shooting styles from landscapes and portraits to wildlife and HDR. Then improve and enhance your images with our top editing advice, and use our Going Pro chapter to turn your hobby into a career. This revised edition contains new guides and the latest techniques to help you to start shooting like a pro.

The ultimate guide to getting the most out of photography

Essential techniques
- Understanding how your camera functions and learning to use its settings creatively.

Shooting styles
- Immerse yourself in the exciting genres photography has to offer.

Editing skills
- All the best tricks to help you edit like a pro.

Going Pro
- Take your photography to the next level.

Also inside...

Essential techniques
- Perfect composition
- Focusing
- Metering advice
- White balance essentials
- Flash basics
- Work in low light
- Use filters

Shooting styles
- 24 hour landscapes
- Wildlife photography
- Guide to macro
- Pro portraits
- Stunning panoramas
- Architectural photography
- HDR shots
- Master monochrome

Editing skills
- 30 top editing tricks
- Fix photos in Camera Raw
- Enhance exposures
- Edit landscapes
- Remove objects
- Retouch model shots
- Convert to black & white

Going Pro
- Pick the right course
- Starting as an assistant
- Getting experience
- Social media marketing
- Making money
- Specialise or adapt?
